EmailTemplate.name: JFS Application Withdrawn
EmailTemplate.subject: Application for Licensure Submitted for Program Number {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_OOS_Program_Number__c} Closed by Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The application for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_OOS_Program_Number__c} is at risk of being closed by the system. You have 60 days remaining to make a recommendation before the system will close the application
Contact the Child Care Help Desk for additional assistance at 1-877-302-2347.
The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team
This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
https://oclqs--sat.cs33.my.salesforce.com/{!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.Id}
